translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

Having been informed by Ensign Bolilho that he had delivered into the custody of this garrison two prisoners by my order, one named Lúcio de Braga, I send this to Your Excellency at Rio Grande to be deported according to the order of His Excellency Your Excellency.

God preserve Your Excellency

Camp near Canguçu, May 16, 1844.

God preserve Your Excellency  
Camp near Canguçu, May 16, 1844.  
Most Illustrious Sir  
Luís José Ferreira  
Lieutenant Colonel  
Commander of the 8th Battalion of Hunters.  
Francisco Pedro de Abreu
